# SonoraKit v0.1 - Chat Application

## Project Overview
- **Type**: Web Chat Application
- **Frontend**: React 18 + TypeScript + Vite
- **UI Library**: React Bits
- **Architecture**: Component-based with clean separation of concerns

## Folder Structure
- `/src/components` - Reusable React components
- `/src/pages` - Page-level components
- `/src/services` - API and business logic services
- `/src/hooks` - Custom React hooks
- `/src/types` - TypeScript type definitions
- `/src/assets` - Static assets (images, styles)
- `/src/utils` - Utility functions

## Development Guidelines
- Use functional components with TypeScript
- Follow React hooks best practices
- Implement proper error handling
- Keep components small and focused
- Use proper typing for all functions and components
